transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan hello.
Customer: Haan ji Pramod ji namaskar sir main Alok baat kar raha hun sir India Mart se relation manager. 
Executive: Ji bataiye. 
Customer: Sir main ye keh raha tha maine kaha kam se kam buyer ki to call aap answer kijiye na sir. 
Customer: Bhai bhale hi aap chaliye. Ji.
Executive: Main keh raha hun ki aap only continue karna hai bar bar India Mart se call aa raha hai subah se lagta hai 10 call aa gaya hai.
Customer: Sir main keh raha hun ki customer ki to call answer kijiye sir usse to company ka koi impact nahi hoga sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive requests customer to answer buyer calls.

- Customer complains about receiving multiple calls from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive stated answering customer calls won't impact company.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, indiaMART
